ValidationRule.description: Concerning the product category 'Belt', fields of the Referential section are mandatory before sending to Referential
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: $User.BypassVR__c = False && SPO_TechMailToreferential__c = True && ISPICKVAL(SPO_ProductCategory__c, "Belt") && OR ( ISBLANK (SPO_Description__c ), NOT(ISPICKVAL (SPO_ManuFacturerProcess__c, "VARIATION" )), ISPICKVAL (SPO_MadeIn__c, "" ), NOT(ISPICKVAL (SPO_SalesType__c, "SALES PRODUCT TO CUSTOMER")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You need to complete the following fields before sending to referential : - description - Made In - ManuFacturer Process = VARIATION - Sales Type = SALES PRODUCT TO CUSTOMER
